---
--- Generated by EmmyLua(https://github.com/EmmyLua)
--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2022/1/18 14:51
---@class HeroProxy
local HeroProxy = {}

function HeroProxy:Init()

end
--- 返回拥有得所有武将
function HeroProxy:getAllHeroList()

end

function HeroProxy:getHeroDataByUid(heroUid)
   -- todo 此处是临时的
    local array_allHero = self:getAllHeroListByCombat()
    for i, v in pairs(array_allHero) do
        if v and v.heroUid == heroUid then
            return v
        end
    end
    return nil
end

--- 返回根据战力 （从大到小） 排序过的 所有武将
function HeroProxy:getAllHeroListByCombat()
   return {
       {
           heroUid = "hero101_0000001",
           heroId = "hero101",
           level = 120,
           star = 5,
           quality = 6,

           occupation = 3,
